author: Unity
description:
Celebrate Latinx creators with us! Elaine Gómez, president of LatinX in Gaming, is joining us to spotlight the winners of the Unidos Game Jam! We’ll dive into this year’s jam details and play the three winning games live, sharing insights on design, creativity, and what makes these projects shine.

Explore more:
LatinX in Gaming: https://www.latinxingaming.com/
Unidos Game Jam 2025: https://itch.io/jam/unidos-jam-2025
title: Unidos Gaming Showcase!

author: Unity
description:
The Splines package makes it easy to generate curves and paths. Use it to draw curved shapes, animating a GameObject's position and rotation along a spline or instantiating prefabs along a spline to create environments. 

Learn more in our documentation: https://on.unity.com/Splines

Find more free Unity learn resources:
https://on.unity.com/learn
title: Unity Tip Tuesday: Splines #gamedev #UnityLearn #UnityTips #Unity3D

author: Unity
description:
This is part 5 in our Unity Gaming Services (UGS) tutorial series. In this video, you’ll learn about the steps for setting up a recoverable method that comes with all iOS phones: Apple Game Center, the recommended method for games on the Apple platform.

This tutorial builds on the simple project from previous tutorials, which consists of simple UI buttons and a LoginManager to handle all the sign-in or linking to providers. 

About the UGS tutorial series
The UGS series consists of 10 sets of tutorials, with each set comprising a video and written tutorial. The topics covered in the UGS tutorial series are:

Welcome and Introduction
Player login
Facebook login
Google Play Games login
Apple Game Center login
Player data
Player economy
Virtual purchases
In-app purchases
Rewarded ads

A demo project for more advanced Unity developers
You can also see these services in action, in a new sample project, Gem Hunter Match – Cloud Edition (GHM – CE). The demo project is aimed at advanced Unit
title: Unity Gaming Services tutorial series, Part 5: Apple Game Center login
